    public class AddRecipe
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements RecipeIngredientFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener, DeleteConfirmationFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    Add Recipe Class for adding new Recipe to Recipes storage extends AppCompatActivity implements RecipeIngredientFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener implements DeleteConfirmationFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    See Also:
    Recipe, RecipeActivity
